New Records: Kieffer Moore scored Wales' fastest goal since 2003 with a 37-second opener
Key Match Events: Kieffer Moore and Harry Wilson scored a quickfire double inside three minutes
Driton Camaj set up a grandstand finish with a goal for Montenegro in the 73rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: Leeds goalkeeper Karl Darlow became Wales' oldest debutant since World War II
Lewis Koumas and Ollie Cooper made their first starts for Wales
Aaron Ramsey, Brennan Johnson, Danny Ward, Jordan James, and Sorba Thomas dropped out of the starting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: Craig Bellamy earned his first win as Wales manager
Wales ended their goal drought with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in rain-lashed conditions in Niksic, Montenegro
The Niksic stadium hosted its first men's senior international
Wales' 800-plus following traveled to Niksic to support the team
Others: Stevan Jovetic, Montenegro's all-time leading scorer, returned to the team after their opening Nations League defeat in Iceland
